EnableDiamondFlower.Description: Adds a crop for growing Diamond Flower

EnableDulseSeaweed.Description: Adds a water crop for growing Dulse Seaweed

EnableFerngillPrimrose.Description: Adds a crop for growing Ferngill Primrose

EnableGoldenOceanFlower.Description: Adds a crop for growing Golden Ocean Flower

EnableGoldenrod.Description: Adds a crop for growing Goldenrod

EnableMushroomColony.Description: Adds a crop for growing Mushroom Colony

EnablePoisonMushroom.Description: Adds a crop for growing Poison Mushroom

EnableRafflesia.Description: Adds a crop for growing Rafflesia

EnableRedBaneberry.Description: Adds a crop for growing Red Baneberry

EnableSwampFlower.Description: Adds a crop for growing Swamp Flowers

EnableThistle.Description: Adds a crop for growing Thistle

EnableWinterRose.Description: Adds a crop for growing Winter Star Rose

EnableBearberry.Description: Adds a bush crop for growing Bearberry.

EnableDewdropBerry.Description: Adds a bush crop for growing Dewdrop Berry.

Enable4LeafClover.Description: Adds a bush crop for growing Four Leaf Clover

EnableMegaPurpleMushroom.Description: Adds a bush crop for growing Mega Purple Mushroom

EnableGreenMushroom.Description: Adds a machine for growing Green Mushroom

EdibleGreenMushroom.Description: Allows Green Mushrooms to be put in dehydrator to make Dried Green Mushrooms

EdibleMonsterMushrooms.Description: Allows Monster Mushrooms to be put in dehydrator to make Dried Monster Mushrooms

MonsterMushroomCategoryChanges.Description: Changes Monster Mushrooms into the 'Mushroom' category, but this doesn't remove it from the Vegetable category, only changes the name

CategoryChanges.Description: Changes some items into 'Mushroom' category, has no gameplay effects

RafflesiaCategoryChanges.Description: Changes SVE's Rafflesia into the Flower category from forage, doesn't change any of Cornucopia's if installed

RafflesiaCornucopia.Description: Use Cornucopia's texture for Raffleisa instead of SVE original look to match looks with Cornucopia

CornucopiaCompat.Description: Adds compatibility between SVE and Cornucopia series, such as changing names of SVE crops. Does not remove any crops
